annotations.text: The naval doctors attending to a wounded Arab. They are wearing  white desinfected masks as the injuries have long looked attention

Donkey transport on the height og Judaea. It will be remembered that during the fighting in the early part of March where tracks are not yet been made, hot tea and other comforts were taken to the fighting troops by donkey transport where no other transport animal could get a foothold.
Le Drapeau du 1er zouaves se rendant aux tranchées
THE WAR. IN THE FRENCH FIRING LINES.
How Algerian soldiers live in the woods close to the German lines. The wood is trenched and wired with barbed entanglements.
Départ des Tirailleurs Marocains pour s'embarquer à la gare pour la direction de Bordeaux
OFFICIAL PRESS BUREAU PASSED FOR PUBLICATION ABROAD
OFFICIAL PRESS BUREAU PASSED FOR PUBLICATION ABORAD
FAST AND SLOW: CAMELS AND MOTOR CARS IN ASIA

Thousands of camels are being used in Asia Minor for bringing up foods tuffs from the base to the front,  An enormous number of them, together with oxen and asses, have been captured from Turks. The British armoured cars have had some exciting adventures, and have routed the enemy several times. Our photo shows A Camel transport. the animals squat down on the ground when being loaded.
